installed_cost_source.notes: $3012/unit ($1.5/ft^2 floor cost premium * 2008 ft^2 floor house/unit from RECS 2015 Table HC10.1 Total square footage of U.S. homes, 2015 file - divide total SF by total homes) + $5100/unit baseline (from EIA data for the total installed cost of 2020 'typical' residential air source heat pumps)

market_scaling_fractions_source.heating: Applies to all residential fuel-fired heating; no electric heating is switched

cooling.title: RECS 2015 Microdata
cooling.fraction_derivation: Cooling multiple of 59.5% was determined as a proportion of total homes with a ducted cooling system where heating is done using any non-electric heating energy source. Total homes with ducted cooling in the sample is 76,090,522, and then filtered for homes with fuel-fired heating system (45,241,958).

market_scaling_fractions_source.water heating: Applies to all residential fuel-fired water heating; no electric water heating is switched

_description: Prospective integrated (or multifunction) air-source heat pump
